name: Dancing Neon Ball: Rush Road
description:
Dancing Neon Ball: Rush Road - a great game in the style of a music runner!
Control a glowing ball and jump through neon rings under the cool bits of electronic music.
Test your skill on the dance floor, jump in a spiral through the rings and listen to great music!
Choose the easy level of difficulty and just have fun in the melodic anti-stress app.
Launch a difficult mode and test yourself at a crazy speed in a neon dance style.
Get rewards every day and buy new balls and tracks!
Collect the entire collection of music hits, which is always updated.
Install the game for the whole family and start your musical adventure!
